titleStmt.title: An exact abridgment of all the trials (not omitting any material passage therein) which have been published since the year 1678 relating to the popish, and pretended Protestant-plots in the reigns of King Charles the 2d, and King James the 2d.
titleStmt.author: P. N.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.D. for Awnsham Churchill, at the Black-Swan in Avy-Mary Lane,

notesStmt.note: Appendix has drop-head title and separate pagination; register is continuous.
Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
